content.raw:
Dear all,
the whole documentation is missing unit indication. Its hard to know what you have to expect if there is no velocity in [m/s] or rotation rate in [turns/s] as it could be [rad/ sec] or degree or anything else. This leaves me to testing each and every new interface I want to use ... This is really annoying for anybody who tries to get into gazebo... many of my students have complained about this ...
Sincerely yours,
Damian
